title: LF D3+ Players for OCAL + Coaches & Analysts
body:
Happy 5's finished week 1 with a top 16 finish and 15 circuit points. We now have a logo and hoodies/jerseys to be ordered. I am looking for players who are looking to compete at an amateur level seriously. 

I'm looking to put together 2 rosters of players and surround them with coaches and analysts (which i will pay for). I'm currently putting together the team for next monday as well so please add me on discord woodcluck #9329 and we'll have a chat.  

If youre a coach or an analyst looking for an amateur gig please hit me up too.

replies.body: Hey mate. Noticed your discord name doesn't work.
